text:
### Instruction:
Analyze the following text and anonymize all personally identifiable information (PII). Return a JSON object with the anonymized text and all replaced tokens.

### Input:
My name is Mario Rossi and my email is mario.rossi@gmail.com. You can call me at +39 333 1234567.

### Response:
{"anonymized_text": "My name is [NAME_1] and my email is [EMAIL_1]. You can call me at [PHONE_1].", "replaced_tokens": [{"replaced_value": "[NAME_1]", "original_value": "Mario Rossi"}, {"replaced_value": "[EMAIL_1]", "original_value": "mario.rossi@gmail.com"}, {"replaced_value": "[PHONE_1]", "original_value": "+39 333 1234567"}]}

### Instruction:
Analyze the following text and anonymize all personally identifiable information (PII). Return a JSON object with the anonymized text and all replaced tokens.

### Input:
Il dottor Giovanni Bianchi, nato il 15/03/1980, risiede in Via Roma 42, 20100 Milano. Il suo codice fiscale è BNCGNN80C15F205X.

### Response:
{"anonymized_text": "Il dottor [NAME_1], nato il [DATE_1], risiede in [ADDRESS_1]. Il suo codice fiscale è [TAX_CODE_1].", "replaced_tokens": [{"replaced_value": "[NAME_1]", "original_value": "Giovanni Bianchi"}, {"replaced_value": "[DATE_1]", "original_value": "15/03/1980"}, {"replaced_value": "[ADDRESS_1]", "original_value": "Via Roma 42, 20100 Milano"}, {"replaced_value": "[TAX_CODE_1]", "original_value": "BNCGNN80C15F205X"}]}

### Instruction:
Analyze the following text and anonymize all personally identifiable information (PII). Return a JSON object with the anonymized text and all replaced tokens.

### Input:
Contact information: John Smith (john.smith@company.com), Office: +1-555-123-4567, Mobile: +1-555-987-6543. SSN: 123-45-6789. Credit Card: 4532-1234-5678-9010.

### Response:
{"anonymized_text": "Contact information: [NAME_1] ([EMAIL_1]), Office: [PHONE_1], Mobile: [PHONE_2]. SSN: [SSN_1]. Credit Card: [CREDIT_CARD_1].", "replaced_tokens": [{"replaced_value": "[NAME_1]", "original_value": "John Smith"}, {"replaced_value": "[EMAIL_1]", "original_value": "john.smith@company.com"}, {"replaced_value": "[PHONE_1]", "original_value": "+1-555-123-4567"}, {"replaced_value": "[PHONE_2]", "original_value": "+1-555-987-6543"}, {"replaced_value": "[SSN_1]", "original_value": "123-45-6789"}, {"replaced_value": "[CREDIT_CARD_1]", "original_value": "4532-1234-5678-9010"}]}

### Instruction:
Analyze the following text and anonymize all personally identifiable information (PII). Return a JSON object with the anonymized text and all replaced tokens.

### Input:
La signora Laura Verdi ha prenotato un appuntamento per il 22 gennaio 2025. Può essere contattata al numero 02-12345678 o all'indirizzo laura.verdi@example.it.

### Response:
{"anonymized_text": "La signora [NAME_1] ha prenotato un appuntamento per il [DATE_1]. Può essere contattata al numero [PHONE_1] o all'indirizzo [EMAIL_1].", "replaced_tokens": [{"replaced_value": "[NAME_1]", "original_value": "Laura Verdi"}, {"replaced_value": "[DATE_1]", "original_value": "22 gennaio 2025"}, {"replaced_value": "[PHONE_1]", "original_value": "02-12345678"}, {"replaced_value": "[EMAIL_1]", "original_value": "laura.verdi@example.it"}]}

### Instruction:
Analyze the following text and anonymize all personally identifiable information (PII). Return a JSON object with the anonymized text and all replaced tokens.

### Input:
Patient record: Name: Anna Ferrari, DOB: 1990-07-12, Insurance ID: INS987654321. Emergency contact: Marco Ferrari at 348-7654321.

### Response:
{"anonymized_text": "Patient record: Name: [NAME_1], DOB: [DATE_1], Insurance ID: [INSURANCE_ID_1]. Emergency contact: [NAME_2] at [PHONE_1].", "replaced_tokens": [{"replaced_value": "[NAME_1]", "original_value": "Anna Ferrari"}, {"replaced_value": "[DATE_1]", "original_value": "1990-07-12"}, {"replaced_value": "[INSURANCE_ID_1]", "original_value": "INS987654321"}, {"replaced_value": "[NAME_2]", "original_value": "Marco Ferrari"}, {"replaced_value": "[PHONE_1]", "original_value": "348-7654321"}]}

### Instruction:
Analyze the following text and anonymize all personally identifiable information (PII). Return a JSON object with the anonymized text and all replaced tokens.

### Input:
Caro Sig. Paolo Neri, la sua richiesta di prestito è stata approvata. Importo: 50000 euro. IBAN: IT60X0542811101000000123456. Firma: Paolo Neri, 10/12/2024.

### Response:
{"anonymized_text": "Caro Sig. [NAME_1], la sua richiesta di prestito è stata approvata. Importo: 50000 euro. IBAN: [IBAN_1]. Firma: [NAME_1], [DATE_1].", "replaced_tokens": [{"replaced_value": "[NAME_1]", "original_value": "Paolo Neri"}, {"replaced_value": "[IBAN_1]", "original_value": "IT60X0542811101000000123456"}, {"replaced_value": "[DATE_1]", "original_value": "10/12/2024"}]}

### Instruction:
Analyze the following text and anonymize all personally identifiable information (PII). Return a JSON object with the anonymized text and all replaced tokens.

### Input:
Employee: Sarah Johnson, Employee ID: EMP-2024-001, Salary: $85,000, Department: Engineering. Contact: sarah.j@techcorp.com, +1-415-555-0199.

### Response:
{"anonymized_text": "Employee: [NAME_1], Employee ID: [EMPLOYEE_ID_1], Salary: $85,000, Department: Engineering. Contact: [EMAIL_1], [PHONE_1].", "replaced_tokens": [{"replaced_value": "[NAME_1]", "original_value": "Sarah Johnson"}, {"replaced_value": "[EMPLOYEE_ID_1]", "original_value": "EMP-2024-001"}, {"replaced_value": "[EMAIL_1]", "original_value": "sarah.j@techcorp.com"}, {"replaced_value": "[PHONE_1]", "original_value": "+1-415-555-0199"}]}

### Instruction:
Analyze the following text and anonymize all personally identifiable information (PII). Return a JSON object with the anonymized text and all replaced tokens.

### Input:
Il cliente Luca Mancini (CF: MNCLCU85M15H501Z) ha effettuato un pagamento di 1200€ con carta **** **** **** 5678 il 5 marzo 2025.

### Response:
{"anonymized_text": "Il cliente [NAME_1] (CF: [TAX_CODE_1]) ha effettuato un pagamento di 1200€ con carta [CREDIT_CARD_1] il [DATE_1].", "replaced_tokens": [{"replaced_value": "[NAME_1]", "original_value": "Luca Mancini"}, {"replaced_value": "[TAX_CODE_1]", "original_value": "MNCLCU85M15H501Z"}, {"replaced_value": "[CREDIT_CARD_1]", "original_value": "**** **** **** 5678"}, {"replaced_value": "[DATE_1]", "original_value": "5 marzo 2025"}]}

### Instruction:
Analyze the following text and anonymize all personally identifiable information (PII). Return a JSON object with the anonymized text and all replaced tokens.

### Input:
Dear Dr. Emily Chen, your appointment is scheduled for January 15, 2025 at 10:00 AM. Location: 123 Medical Plaza, Suite 456, Boston, MA 02101. Patient ID: PT-789-2024.

### Response:
{"anonymized_text": "Dear Dr. [NAME_1], your appointment is scheduled for [DATE_1] at 10:00 AM. Location: [ADDRESS_1]. Patient ID: [PATIENT_ID_1].", "replaced_tokens": [{"replaced_value": "[NAME_1]", "original_value": "Emily Chen"}, {"replaced_value": "[DATE_1]", "original_value": "January 15, 2025"}, {"replaced_value": "[ADDRESS_1]", "original_value": "123 Medical Plaza, Suite 456, Boston, MA 02101"}, {"replaced_value": "[PATIENT_ID_1]", "original_value": "PT-789-2024"}]}

### Instruction:
Analyze the following text and anonymize all personally identifiable information (PII). Return a JSON object with the anonymized text and all replaced tokens.

Fattura n. 2024/0123 intestata a: Giulia Santoro, P.IVA: 12345678901, Via Garibaldi 78, 50100 Firenze. Tel: 055-1234567, Email: g.santoro@azienda.it

### Response:
{"anonymized_text": "Fattura n. 2024/0123 intestata a: [NAME_1], P.IVA: [VAT_1], [ADDRESS_1]. Tel: [PHONE_1], Email: [EMAIL_1]", "replaced_tokens": [{"replaced_value": "[NAME_1]", "original_value": "Giulia Santoro"}, {"replaced_value": "[VAT_1]", "original_value": "12345678901"}, {"replaced_value": "[ADDRESS_1]", "original_value": "Via Garibaldi 78, 50100 Firenze"}, {"replaced_value": "[PHONE_1]", "original_value": "055-1234567"}, {"replaced_value": "[EMAIL_1]", "original_value": "g.santoro@azienda.it"}]}
